item.title: Filecop
item.description: What is it ? It is very easy to use, you can create a user and encrypt with the information you want. The program also includes a password generator. Setup Tables Questions Answers all file type(s) supports all file types ! using internet connection? nope supports all operating systems? only for windows

item.title: Gri Makina
item.description: What is it ? They are structures designed for use in agricultural lands. They can detect speeds on vehicles that do not have a speedometer, such as a combine harvester, thanks to sensors. Additionally, they inform the user about the distance they will be planting crops. Easy to use GUI support Robust

item.title: Jet File Transfer
item.description: What is it ? Jet File Transfer is an application that allows you to easily share files and folders between devices connected to the same network without using the Internet. Desktop application is free for all desktop operating systems. Since two devices launched as server and client can find each other automatically, just press a button! Tables Questions Answers all file type(s) supports all file types ! using internet connection? network is required but does not use your internet !

item.title: Quiz It
item.description: What is it ? Quiz It is an internet application where you can easily study English words. You can easily learn words from among many words prepared for you. Node js based api developed for quiz application. ‚ú® Demo ‚ú® Frontend ‚ú® Backend Prerequisites node 10.15.3 npm 6.4.1 Install npm install Docker docker build -t quiz_api . docker run --env SWAGGER_HOST=localhost -p 4000:4000 quiz_api Usage npm run start Run tests npm run test ü§ù Contributing Contributions, issues and feature requests are welcome!

item.title: rabbitmq-mail-consumer-server
item.description: What is it ? They are structures designed on working in agricultural lands. On vehicles that do not have a speedometer such as a combine harvester, it can detect speeds thanks to the sensors. By the way, it tells the user how many meters it will be planting crops. Github rabbitmq-mail-consumer-server Rabbitmq-mail-consumer-server is an independent mail sending server that abstracts the sending mails from system. Services that want to send mail do not need to know where and how this server works üòé.

item.title: Streamle
item.description: What is it ? Each daily Streamle features a photo clip from a popular TV Show or Movie published on a popular streaming platform. Guess in as few tries as possible, and be sure to come back every day for a new Movie/Series. Streamle helps you find content to watch on your favorite streaming platform with a triva-like interface inspired by Wordle & Heardle and all …dle family. Each daily Streamle features a photo clip from a popular TV Show or Movie published on the streaming platform.
